nodes.title: Rocket Beta - The social media that helps you focus, not distract you

nodes.excerpt: ev.energy automatically allows you to charge your electric vehicle in the most cost-effective and least carbon-intense way possible, all while you earn cash rewards for your smart charging! Available in the https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315, https://apps.apple.com/us/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315 and https://apps.apple.com/de/app/ev-energy-smart-ev-charging/id1418569315.
nodes.title: ev.energy - A cheaper, greener, simpler way to charge your EV
nodes.author: Nico Gregori

nodes.excerpt: SÄdu is an ESG solution for companies that want to take their first steps towards sustainability. The mobile app rewards an active lifestyle with trees. Sync your fitness tracker or enter your last workout in the app to earn trees with every fitness activity.
nodes.title: SÄdu - Invest in your health, save trees
nodes.author: Elise Cannon

nodes.excerpt: Treepoints is revolutionising the fight against climate change. A simple planet positive subscription to offset your entire carbon footprint, plant trees and prevent plastic pollution. Plus earn points for your climate action to spend on sustainable brands.
nodes.title: Treepoints - Fight climate change and earn rewards
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: We compile hundreds of sustainability sources into one digestible score so you can make more informed purchases. You can find them where you will actually use them - whether that's in your Amazon search, google shopping search or just on the brand's website.
nodes.title: Ethically - Conscious consumerism right from the tip of your mouse
nodes.author: Jada McLean

nodes.excerpt: Cryptocurrencies produce a substantial carbon footprint. Canopi enables anyone to measure and eliminate those emissions. The calculator is powered by our Climate API, which is also helping companies across fintech, e-commerce, transportation, & travel.
nodes.title: Crypto Carbon Footprint Calculator - Calculate & offset emissions from your cryptocurrencies
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: After being heads-down for months on our first app, we're excited to officially launch our public beta today & we're hungry for feedback! :) If you're willing to give it a go today, we'll build you custom jeans for less than what it costs us to make them. ğŸ¤“
nodes.title: unspun - 3D iphone scans â†’ ultra-sustainable & custom-built jeans
nodes.author: Kevin Martin

nodes.excerpt: Add this short (31 second) song to streaming playlists. All the $ generated goes to reforesting the world. Every ~100 streams we plant a tree. It's the world's first MP-Tree Offset your streaming
nodes.title: This Song Plants Trees - Stream this 30 sec song. Every 100 plays we plant a tree
nodes.author: Matt Gordon

nodes.excerpt: Discover the cost of charging your Tesla. Generate detailed reports, gain insight into your real consumption costs and include charging costs in your company's accounting. All for free.
nodes.title: EEVEE - Tesla EV charging app to track & manage charging costs
nodes.author: Steffen Brans

nodes.excerpt: Ice Sucks. This portable electric refrigerator has two zones to cool or freeze, keeping food cold for 10+ hours with built-in battery. Forget soggy sandwiches and melted ice; everything stays dry and organized since Chillest cools with the power of the Sun.
nodes.title: GoSun Chillest - Coolers are a pain in the ice, go solar.
nodes.author: Patrick Sherwin

nodes.excerpt: Given the impact the Sun â˜€ï¸ has on all our lives, a tool to predict its availability is surprisingly missing â€“ Shadowmap is here to change that. It visualizes sunlight and solar shadows based on 3D data in a worldwide interactive maps app.
nodes.title: Shadowmap - Interactive 3D maps app to visualize solar shadows worldwide
nodes.author: Thomas Schranz â›„ï¸

nodes.excerpt: The Sounds of Earth project aims to raise awareness for the protection and restoration of our ecosystems by reminding people of the uniqueness and natural beauties of this planet.
nodes.title: Sounds of Earth - Listen to relaxing ambient sounds of nature
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Plan more environmentally friendly journeys around the UK and help offset emissions by planting trees!
nodes.title: Travlee - Plan journeys, plant trees, offset emissions
nodes.author: Nick Wilkins

nodes.excerpt: A free one stop shop to inform you about the true cost of common goods, and provide sustainable, ethical, and more affordable alternatives. We take care of the heavy lifting by researching the good lifecycle, its ingredients, and finding brands you can trust.
nodes.title: Do One Better - Resource for sustainable, ethical & affordable goods
nodes.author: Gibson Chu

nodes.excerpt: Lomi is the world's first home composter that's able to break down bioplastics. Using heat, abrasion, and oxygen it is able to complete the composting process in as little as 4 hours - odor free and mess free.
nodes.title: Lomi Home Composter - Turn waste to compost with a single button
nodes.author: Chris Fleguel

nodes.excerpt: In the biggest update to Google Earth since 2017, you can now see our planet in an entirely new dimension â€” time. With Timelapse in Google Earth, 24 million satellite photos from the past 37 years have been compiled into an interactive 4D experience.
nodes.title: Timelapse in Google Earth ğŸŒ - Watch time unfold and witness 40 years of planetary change

nodes.excerpt: We are building the world's largest data service about the real impacts brands have on the issues that matter. We make it easy to find good products from good companies.
nodes.title: Motive RealScore - Find the real impact of brands on the issues that matter
nodes.author: Kai Gray

nodes.excerpt: Greg is a simple app that will coach you to grow healthy, happier plants. â € Greg uses insights from plant physics to train machine learning algorithms so you know when to water each of your plants, in whichever environment theyâ€™re in.
